text: Wilbur Allen "Bill" Coven (February 16, 1920 – December 7, 1998) was an American professional basketball player. He played in the National Basketball League for the Rochester Royals during the 1946–47 season and averaged 1.8 points per game. ==References== ==External links== * Elyria Sports Hall of Fame profile Category:1920 births Category:1998 deaths Category:American army personnel of World War II Category:American men's basketball players Category:Baldwin Wallace Yellow Jackets men's basketball players Category:Basketball players from Ohio Category:Centers (basketball) Category:Forwards (basketball) Category:North Carolina Tar Heels men's basketball players Category:People from Elyria, Ohio Category:Rochester Royals players Category:Toledo Rockets men's basketball players
title: Bill Coven
